EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Inquiry (1325798575.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Thomas,
As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you. My name is Nicolette Taylor and I’ll be responsible for answering any questions you may have and providing you an overview of our services. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you to chat using my online schedule.
You may also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube.
You may also look at some of the stories from indepdenents who use MBO Partners.
I look forward to speaking with you,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
